data.title: About Us
data.meta_description: Do Braza Brazilian Food, coxinhas, pasteis, empadas, pao de queijo, guarana We Love to Party! Anniversary, Weddings, Birthdays, Corporate Events, Baby & Bridal Showers. We cater any size party. GRASS-FED MEATS | LOCAL PRODUCE | SUSTAINABLE FOOD IN 2016 WE BECAME GMO FREE, ORGANIC, with more GLUTEN FREE, PALEO & VEGAN options We also customize to create special flavors as you wish. We cater for companies now too. For Catering orders call us: 619-300-1832 San Diego, California or 808-265-1954 Oahu, Hawaii
data.text:
“From small meetings to special moments or in large Festivals, Do Braza offers you the best Brazilian food, great taste, and excellent service.”

Uniqueness or innovation

Do Braza was @ the 1st Rock in Rio USA in Las Vegas - 2015

Who was playing? Metallica, Bruno Mars, Taylor Swift, No Doubt

http://rockinrio.com/usa/for-a-better-world/sustainability/rock-in-rio-sustainability-contest/

Do Braza was the pioneer of Brazilian food at Farmers Markets in San Diego and Hawaii.

The ONLY company that participate in all events in the community

Carnivals: Christine Portella & Brazilian Productions, Ariel Del Mundo, Baile do Victinho, Andre Monari

World Cup: Museum of man Opening Event, and Former PB Bar & Grill

Brazilian Day San Diego-Biggest Brazilian West Cost event: since the first event on 2008

We sell food when important bandsmen artists come from Brazil: Leandro Hassum, Oriente, Fabio Rabin, Marcello D2, Ed Motta, Carlinhos Brown, Casuarina, Armandinho and band, Natiruts, Cidade Negra, Tribo de Jah, Monobloco.

We sell at Kaaboo: Aerosmith, Lenny Kravitz, Jack Johnson

Sustainability/environmentally friendly

We have a compost bin that turns our organic trash into rich garden compost.

We grow our own fresh organic herbs to use in our food

We recycle our used oil and our glass, cans & foil as well from our trashcans after the events.

We Won the ROCK IN RIO sustainability contest!!!!

We offer Gluten Free & Vegetarian options in our menu

We participate special events like Earth Day San Diego

Positive impact on community

We bring an international exchange of arts, culture, and culinary from Brazil to America.

We are the main food vendors/sponsors from all events in the Brazilian community in San Diego.
